greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2*a(n - 2) for n > 2; a(1) = 1, a(2) = 8.
comment: Interleaving of A000079 and A000079 without initial terms 1, 2, 4.
Binomial transform is A048696. Second binomial transform is A164298.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x)/(1 - 10*x + 17*x^2), {x,0,50}], x] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 12 2017 *)
program: (MAGMA) [ n le 2 select 7*n-6 else 2*Self(n-2): n in [1..41] ];
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Aug 17 2009
